articles.title: Verstappen recovers from P10 to take Hungarian GP win as Mercedes secure double podium - Formula 1
articles.description: Max Verstappen won the 2022 Hungarian Grand Prix from P10 with pitch-perfect execution of Red Bull’s strategy, while Lewis Hamilton finished second ahead of his pole-sitting Mercedes team mate George Russell.
